title: Simple looms. Part 1
creator_credit: John Gray and Ken J. Widdowson
brief_description: A how-to-do it program intended to provide the viewer with the confidence, skill and interest to try it for themselves. Suggestions are given on how inspiration and ideas may be drawn from the natural world for weaving design themes.
